If you only use the radio for traffic jam info or in a convoy you will not be happy with the performance.I got this to avoid the redneck look, tuned it (1.3:1 highest) and was not getting more than maybe 3/4 mile when I tested with a buddy who has a known good rig in his truck.Put the $18 toward something better and go with a magnet mount or properly grounded body mount antennaMy windows are polarized and from what I understand that can cause issues with these antennas. I've been told that older, non-polarized glass will allow the signal to pass from inside to outside more easily. YMMV
